Summary Note:
The RM met Louise Laurène Thomas during a business conference in Paris. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Louise Laurène Thomas is a 31 year old Investment Director from France.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Louise Laurène Thomas has been happily married to Fournier since 2023. Together they have 1 kid called Juliette.
Education Background:
Louise obtained her secondary school diploma from Lycée Polyvalent François Mauriac in 2011.
Louise earned her degree from École Normale Supérieure (ENS) Paris in 2018.
In 2020, she received extra education and graduated from EMIC de Nice with an additional degree.
Occupation History:
Louise Laurène Thomas is a 31 year old Investment Director from France.
At Société Générale S.A., Louise Laurène Thomas held the position of Family Office Manager from 2018 to 2019, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Investment Director at Société Générale S.A. in 2019, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 50000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has flat located in Paris, worth 1430000 EUR.


Following the passing of her grandfather, a successful Tech Entrepreneur, she received an inheritance of 2690000 EUR in 2020, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
